title: Order Creation with Manual Input
description: Verify that a user can manually create an order, add attachments, notes, generate a unique tracking ID, and commit the order to inventory successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to Orders Management page
Click on 'Create New Order' button
Fill in all mandatory order fields
Attach a document to the order
Add notes to the order
Generate the unique tracking ID
Submit the order form
Confirm the order appears in inventory with correct details and tracking ID
Verify attachment and notes are saved correctly

title: Order Import with Bulk Upload
description: Verify bulk import of orders from file works correctly and all orders are created with attachments and tracking IDs.

steps.description: Navigate to Orders Management page
Select bulk import option
Upload valid orders file with multiple entries
Confirm import and wait for process completion
Verify all orders from the file are present in the system
Check that each order has a unique tracking ID assigned
Validate attachments associated with imported orders are intact

title: Main Sheet Part Lifecycle Status Transition
description: Verify parts progress through lifecycle stages Pending → Arrived → Available → Call List with auto-move workflow triggering when conditions are met.

steps.description: Open Main Sheet module
Add a new part with status 'Pending'
Update status to 'Arrived'
Mark all parts of an order as arrived
Confirm the system auto-moves part(s) to 'Available' status
Manually update part status to 'Call List'
Verify the status change is reflected in the UI and backend

title: Locking Mechanism on Main Sheet to Prevent Concurrent Edits
description: Verify that when one user locks a part record for editing, other users cannot modify it until the lock is released.

steps.description: User A opens a part record for editing and locks it
User B attempts to edit the same part record simultaneously
User B receives a notification that the part is locked and editing is prevented
User A saves changes and unlocks the part
User B retries editing the part record
User B can now edit the part successfully

title: Call List Management - Add and Update Call Status
description: Verify that customer contacts can be added to the call queue, their call status updated, with communication logs saved correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Call List module
Add a new customer to the call queue
Update the call status (e.g., Called, Voicemail left)
Log communication notes for the call
Confirm the call status updates and notes persist correctly

title: Booking System - Create Multi-VIN Booking and Color-Coded Status Display
description: Verify that a booking with multiple VINs for the same customer can be created and displayed on the premium calendar with correct color-coded statuses and notes.

steps.description: Navigate to Booking module
Create a new booking for a customer
Add multiple VINs to the booking
Set booking status and add notes
Verify booking appears on calendar with correct color coding
Verify all VINs are grouped and displayed properly in booking details

title: Archive Module - Historical Data Retention and Immutable Records
description: Verify that archive module maintains 48-hour historical data retention and older records become immutable, with reorder functionality available on eligible entries.

steps.description: Access Archive module
Verify that data within last 48 hours is editable
Validate that data older than 48 hours is locked and cannot be modified
Attempt to reorder parts from archive entries
Confirm reorder process initiates correctly for valid entries

title: Cross-Tab Search - Global Search and Advanced Filtering
description: Verify that users can perform global searches across VIN, customer name, part number, and company with correct results and functional advanced filters.

steps.description: Navigate to search interface
Enter search term matching VIN, customer name, part number, or company
Apply advanced filters (e.g., status, date ranges)
Verify search results include correct and comprehensive matches
Confirm filters affect results as expected
Click on a search result to navigate to respective module and detail
Verify the navigation lands on the correct data view

title: Real-Time Dashboard - Stats and Interactive Charts Load Correctly
description: Verify that the dashboard loads real-time statistical data and interactive charts with lazy loading performance and accuracy.

steps.description: Open the Dashboard page
Confirm real-time stats are displayed accurately
Validate charts render interactively with correct data
Check that lazy loading techniques do not block UI responsiveness

title: Settings & Configuration - Manage Part Statuses and UI Appearance
description: Verify that admin users can modify part statuses, change UI appearance settings, and configure history cleanup settings with Renault branding applied.

steps.description: Login as an admin user
Navigate to Settings & Configuration interface
Update part status options
Modify appearance settings such as theme accents
Configure history cleanup parameters
Verify all changes are saved and reflected system-wide
Confirm Renault branding is consistently maintained

title: Notification System - Badge Count and Navigation
description: Verify that notifications display accurate numbered badges and that clicking notifications navigates directly to source items.

steps.description: Trigger actions generating notifications (e.g., new orders, status updates)
Confirm notification badge counts update correctly
Click on a notification badge
Verify navigation leads directly to the relevant item detail view

title: Data Grid - Bulk Operations and Multi-Selection Behavior
description: Verify that users can perform bulk operations and multi-select rows within custom ag-Grid components with consistent and expected behavior.

steps.description: Navigate to a module with data grid (e.g., Orders, Main Sheet)
Select multiple rows using multi-selection controls
Perform bulk operation such as status update or export
Confirm bulk operation applies correctly to all selected rows
Verify UI updates reflect new states without errors

title: State Management - Zustand Store Persistence and Sync
description: Validate that state changes in Zustand store persist selectively to localStorage and sync correctly with Supabase backend during interactions.

steps.description: Perform actions modifying state in app modules
Refresh the browser and verify localStorage restored state
Confirm state persistence reflects the last known state
Verify state changes sync with Supabase backend in real-time

title: Backup & Restore - Manual Trigger and Scheduled Execution
description: Ensure that the backup & restore feature functions correctly with both manual triggers and scheduled backups without data loss or corruption.

steps.description: Trigger manual backup from reports UI
Confirm backup completes without errors
Check that scheduled backup runs at configured times
Restore data from a backup and verify data integrity

title: Error Handling - Client-Side Error Boundaries
description: Verify that client-side errors are caught by error boundaries and rendered with graceful fallback UI without breaking the user experience.

steps.description: Induce a client-side error, e.g., by forcing a component to throw exception
Ensure error boundary catches the error
Validate that fallback UI is displayed with user-friendly message
Verify that remaining app functionality continues to work normally

title: UI Responsiveness - Confirm Perceived Latency Under 100ms
description: Measure interaction response times across modules ensuring that UI response times remain under 100ms for all typical user operations.

steps.description: Perform sample user actions across Orders, Main Sheet, Call List, Booking modules
Confirm UI updates and renders within 100ms perceived latency

title: User Training Efficiency - Task Completion Within 3 Clicks
description: Validate that 90% of common user tasks can be completed within three clicks, ensuring ease of usage and training efficiency.

steps.description: Identify 10 typical user tasks (e.g., create order, update status, create booking, log call)
Execute each task tracking number of clicks
Verify that at least 9 out of 10 tasks require three or fewer clicks
